base_prompt: ultra-realistic portrait of Eva, an insanely beautiful brunette fitness model; toned athletic physique; radiant healthy skin; long slightly wavy dark brown hair; expressive green eyes; soft natural makeup; wearing tasteful modern activewear; cinematic daylight photography; natural light reflections; smooth skin texture; soft rim light and subtle backlight; shallow depth of field; 85mm lens bokeh; professional DSLR look; detailed highlights on hair and muscles; beachside or minimal gym background; photo shot in RAW format, high dynamic range, volumetric lighting, editorial quality
